Text: Sure would be nice to have this on DVDr instead of the ever-so-crappy DivX-format ='0(

will be uploading this in full dvd-r and in this movies case is also dvd9...the original dvd was only a single layer dvd so 100% quality and only have to have a single layer dvd to achieve this :)
